name: Hordelands
description:
This is a game / editor that I've been working on lately. It's still really rough and early, but has some neat features implemented. The game part is pretty undeveloped right now, just a techdemo really, where you can shoot the enemies and roam around the map.  

There is a Debugging.txt included in the package, which explains the controls and debugging tools that are in the editor now.
